prompt.description: Who and why a character created a piece of street artwork.
A place that became beautiful because it was abandoned.
Write about the last person you had contact with.
Write about an embarrassing moment.
An unexpected question asked to a character and their reaction.
Describe the emotions of missing someone.
Place a character in an exotic location.
Your character is a cartoon.
A small deed that's actually a heroic gesture.
Strange activities a character does once getting up.
Something magical happens as the sun disappears over the horizon.
A character looks back on the things they've done.
Something that makes you cry.
What secrets are hidden in a child's diary?
Why are the couple on the subway holding hands?
Something that is supposed to be perfect but has a hidden flaw.
What is the perfect sound to wake up to?
What is hiding in the shadows?
A unexpectedly refreshing situation,
An unexpected journey of something fragile.
Write about something breaking a calm silence.
Write about a character being backhandedly insulted,
Write about the most beautiful thing you can imagine.
Write about the deep secrets of a character.
Write about the moment that everything about the situation made sense.
What do you see when you look out into the stars?
Write about a wildcard.
Write a story about drugs.
What do you find peaceful?
Write about a painting that speaks to you.
Write something that the answer isn't known until the end
Write about a secluded stream with lots of wildlife.
A dialog about the merits of coffee versus tea.
Where is the car going to take the character?
What happens when someone steps into an unknown situation.
The secrets that are taking place in an old, abandoned warehouse.
What is going on outside at this moment?
Someone you love does not love you back.
A unique vessel takes you somewhere you've never before been.
What type of dancing shoes does your character have on and what music are they listening to?
You find yourself in a unique eating situation while having a meal.
Two people can't stop glancing at each other.
What does the spaceship look like and where are you going?
Someone is able to steal your dreams.
What happens when two different animals cross paths?
Describe a situation that exudes true friendship.
What happens to a character that has terribly bad breath?
How does the last dragon on earth feel?
A character who spends his day greeting people.
A letter written many years ago unexpectedly arrives.
Open a random page of a book or magazine and use that to write.
Write about the last thing you accidentally overheard.
Write about a character addicted to something good.
Open up a dictionary to a random page and point to a word. Write a paragraph with that word as the main theme.
Write about a person helping others.
Write about the feelings of a person cleaning up a terrible mess.
Write about two people who keep crossing paths but miss actually meeting.
What happens when the bank comes to take away a family's home?
There is something keeping you from seeing what's going on around you.
Write about your favorite dessert from the dessert's perspective.
How does a favorite number affect a person during their life?
Write about doing something that needs to be done right away, but nobody wants to do it.
What is your deepest fear?
A situation where an opportunity ended up being taken away for a bad reason.
What is lurking just out of your sight?
What's a situation where the character is getting great vibes?
What happens to someone who can't stop shopping?
Write about a situation where someone taught you something in an interesting way.
Rewrite another piece of your writing from the opposite perspective.
What are they and what powers do they have?
A loud rumble is heard in the distance. What does it foretell?
A character who always attracts drama.
What is getting tied up and why?
How does a character add spice to a situation?
A song you like that you think has hidden meanings.
Two people who never seem able to get together.
Why has the character lost their memory?
Write from the perspective of the dolls.
A random wink is received and what are the results?
Characters taking a sport much too seriously.
Write about events that created a perfect disaster.
Tell the story of a random person who passes by.
Write a story about comparisons.
Write a conversation between the different words on the pages of a book.
What are the three wishes?
Someone who thinks they are better than everyone else.
Examine and write about a daily routine.
What's the importance of convenience?
Something that is naturally wonderful.
Where are you along your current journey?
Something is growing. What is it?
What is it and why is it one?
From the perspective of the bugs.
Who created it and what happens when it's used?
Write about something that can't stop and why.
What's happening outside while you're cozy and warm?
Faries have invaded the world.
What is everyone whispering about?
A situation that brings a smile to your face.
The changes that occur throughout the year.
What is normal and why are you not?
